segments.text: Would you like to come over for dinner tonight ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , but I have to tell you that I've become a vegetarian . I don't eat any kind of meat .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: When did you decide to become a vegetarian ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I saw a program a few months ago about how animals are raised for human consumption . I haven't been able to eat a single piece of meat since .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's great . Do you find that you eat a lot more fruit and vegetables now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Definitely . I've also been buying organic fruit and vegetables , which is more expensive , but much better for you because they don't have any pesticides on them .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You've really turned into a health nut , haven't you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I guess you could say that . Eating fruit and vegetables helps keep you healthy . I've lost 5 pounds and I feel great !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How do you get enough protein in your diet ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I eat a lot more tofu , beans , nuts and some fish .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , don't worry about dinner . I'll only make vegetarian dishes for you . Do you like sushi ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I prefer cooked fish to raw fish , but if you really like it , make it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How about a spicy tofu and vegetable stir-fry ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That sounds great . What time should I come over ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Dinner will be ready at about 7:30 pm , so you can come over at 7 p . m .
segments.speaker: S1
